mapper.select: SELECT id, title, category_id, author, article_img,content FROM t_article WHERE category_id=#{categoryId} AND authed=TRUE ORDER BY weight DESC limit 1
SELECT id, title, category_id, article_img FROM t_article WHERE category_id=#{categoryId} AND authed=TRUE ORDER BY weight DESC

SELECT id, title, category_id, create_time, xfrom, author, summary, article_img, keywords ,authed ,weight FROM t_article WHERE 1=1
AND category_id = #{categoryId}
AND category_id in (select id from t_article_category where pre_id = #{categoryId})
AND (title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR author like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR xfrom like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR keywords like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY weight DESC
